market_value_information_source: Registered sale deed dated 03-Feb-2020; Local estate agent; quoted rate adjusted for negotiation
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, house plan permission, tax receipt, electricity bill, valuation initiation form, initiation mail
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located in Green Villas, Ameenpur Village, Sangareddy District.
• As per the copy of sale deed provided by HSBC, the land area for the subject property was identified as 134 sq yd or 1,206 sft.
• Built-up area as per the sale deed is 2,100 sft (Ground floor: 1,050 sft, First floor: 1,050 sft).
• Built-up area as per the gram panchayat plan is 1,496 sft.
• There is a deviation between planned and actual built up area (+40.4%).
• The property is fully constructed and self-occupied.
• Amenities include compound wall, municipal water supply, and electricity connection.
• No negative area elements were observed in the surroundings; the area is fully residential with good infrastructure.
• The property is not outside city limits.
• The valuation is based on comparable sales and market research for similar properties in the locality.
• For the purpose of this value assessment, it is assumed that the subject property has a clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been duly obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 22 July 2025 is INR 9,240,000/- [Nine Million Two Hundred Forty Thousand Rupees] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
